result.title: Principle Engineer/Sr. Engineer
result.description:
About the Role

The Recruiting Marketing team is looking for an energetic and dependable individual, who is passionate in solving complex system level problems, creating scalable and highly efficient frameworks and supporting software development across the whole business suite. A professional with solid grounding in Computer Science, strong competencies in security, data structures, algorithms and software design is an ideal candidate for this team.
result.location: San Ramon, 年底之前在家工作
